title: Derek Archambault from Defeater/Alcoa
itunes:title: Derek Archambault from Defeater/Alcoa
description:
Derek, the vocalist, from Defeater is the first guest to have sat down with me, more than once to complete this compelling chat about growing up punk, defining moments and how to keep your passion for independent music alive.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
